ygData.subject: Simply Charming...
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, so there I was in NK with nothing to do when I sees a Griffon.  Then I sees another Girffon.  Hmm, well I can just zone if it goes bad.  So, I target one
ygData.messageBody:
Ok, so there I was in NK with nothing to do when I sees a Griffon. Then I
sees another Girffon. Hmm, well I can just zone if it goes bad. So, I
target one and equip crude stein and sing charm:

your target is too far away...
your target is too far away...
you target is too far away...
you target is too far away...
[ nothing ]
[ nothing ]
[ nothing ]
your target resists the Song of the Sirens spell...
[ nothing ]
a grifon hits YOU for 64
a grifon hits YOU for 64

Ruh roh! Time to start moving. So then as I am heading to the Plains of
the Western Karana, I sees old Guard Frederick killing some corrupt lion and
I train Merv onto poor old Guard Fred. Well, old Fred starts whacking on
Merv but Merv don't care about some lame greenie whacking at him and keeps
chasing me. So, I just keep on kiting and eventually Fred nibbles him down
and KS's him off me.

So now I am thinking, hmmm, I bet I could do this with a party member and we
would get he kill and the xp??? Might have to try it sometime. I think that
Merv might view things a little differently if a party member is slashing
his tail feathers or not? Or charm Fred when he has Merv down to low health
- I guess that would have worked too. I was in a risk adverse mood right
then.

The day before - we tried to take a SG in S. Ro (we were after Kililji
plans.) A lo 30's bard and a lo 30's necro and me at 38. Well, things got
all messed up and I was beat down to low hp and the other bard got killed
and I was running for the zone. For some reason, pathing problem or what
not, the SG got a free tele port right to me from half way across the zone.
Hit, hit, dead. Ugh.

Sylly

p.s. ya, I know I had been warned! But sheesh!
